text: L'homme au bob (literally The men with bucket hat) is the first studio album of Gradur, a French rapper of Congolese descent. ==Track list== #"Calibré" (2:51) #"Terrasser" (3:41) #"J'donne ça" (feat. Alonzo) (4:39) #"Jamais" (3:07) #"Militarizé" (feat. Niro) (4:30) #"Bloody Murder" (4:12) #"R.D.C." (3:07) #"Priez Pour Moi" (3:36) #"Bang Bang" (feat. Chief Keef) (3:45) #"Stringer Bell" (4:22) #"Verre de Sky" (3:54) #"La Douille" (feat. Lacrim) (4:54) #"Beef" (5:09) #"Makak" (3:56) #"#Lhommeaubob" (feat. Migos) (4:24) #"Secteur" (feat. Kayna Samet) (3:57) #"Confessions" (5:04) ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Charts (2015) ! Peak position |- |- |- |- |} ==References== Category:2015 albums Category:French- language albums
title: L'homme au bob
